ygData.subject: Re: Tripred Meeting
ygData.msgSnippet: Daemos looks around, seeing no more disapproval than Belthassan s clenched jaw and Melchana s usual I-despise-everything expression. Daemos: Good. We ll have

Daemos looks around, seeing no more disapproval than Belthassan's 
clenched jaw and Melchana's usual I-despise-everything expression.

Daemos: Good. We'll have to modify the Hellgate a bit so we can all 
go. Jetstorm, Anachronox, this job is yours. I want you two to arrange 
the cargo bay to fit troop transport. Melchana, call Autobot base. 
Gesper has to come back as soon as possible.

Jetstorm takes a sideglance at Anachronox, his arms crossed.

Jetstorm: Whenever you're ready...

Melchana opens a frequency with the Hidden One.

Melchana: Autobot base, this is Shadow Destiny. We would like to talk 
with the Tripredacus ambassador.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> -- Anachronox / Pacifix --
> 
> Pacifix makes his way back to the base. He opens a commmlink to all 
> autobots, "JetV and Artemis, status report please."
> 
> -------------------
> 
> Anachronox nods his approval.
> 
> ooC: not much else he can do. =P
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > OOC: Somehow, I knew Tankor wouln't give an immediate response. 
> Cope 
> > up with it!
> > 
> > Tankor went back to the control room. Jetstorm flew in at the same 
> > moment.
> > 
> > Tankor: Back so soon?
> > 
> > Jetstorm took an irritated look.
> > 
> > Jetstorm: How does it concern you? Those angelions were mere 
> > mockery...
> > 
> > They both entered the control room where Daemos, Belthassan and 
> > Anachronox were. Melchana came in moments later.
> > 
> > Daemos: Alright. We will start now, no need to wait for Strika... 
> > Tripredacus, we are on the brink of a new age. In short time, we 
> will 
> > start to gather more and more energon, and send it back to Raiko-
> Fhi 
> > 8. However, there are shadows in our skies. First, the 
> Infecticons. We 
> > shall deal with them in their own time. Also, more concretely, we 
> have 
> > to deal with a direct threat to our plan. Prophecy, display world 
> map, 
> > energon concentration and Spark location.
> > 
> > The computer complied.
> > 
> > Daemos: Geological study reveals that fertile grounds for the 
> energon 
> > fruits are in this area (points towards greece). However, There 
> are 
> > many transformers in there, more precisely inside the volcano 
> named 
> > the Etna. I do not know exactly who is there, but expectations are 
> for 
> > worst, hopes for the best. Gesper will soon be recalled as to 
> permit 
> > the assistance of Prophetus in case of danger, so this means the 
> > Prophets go. I shall go too. Anachronox will be coming as well as 
> > Jetstorm. Tankor, you will be in charge of the Shadow Destiny 
> until we 
> > return. Questions?
